title: [GAMEPLAY] Arcade Miss Fortune sound effects mixed up
body:
It's still happening.
1. If an Arcade Miss Fortune and a differently skinned Miss Fortune are in the same game, Arcade Miss Fortune will use the default auto attack sound.
2. Arcade Miss Fortune only plays 1 of 2 sound effects when triggering Love Tap. i.e. there is a bwip but no bwoop.

I forget when I first reported this, but here's someones thread from 5 months ago.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/29yOVGFZ-gameplay-arcade-miss-fortune-sounds-bug-by-a-mirror-pick

KateyKhaos, you are _breaking my heart_.

replies.body:
I'm not trying to break your heart, I swear! D: 

We are aware of the issue. As I've mentioned before, this isn't a game breaking issue, so it's not top priority. That said, it is something we would like to and will fix. It hasn't fallen off the radar. Please hang tight! :)

Oop, legitimate update this time.

Looks like Arcade MF is using the classic AA sounds all the time, whether there is another MF or not.
At least for a custom and a couple of hexakill today.
Ok but I expect a big fireworks explosion in the patch notes when this happens.
